pkgmetadata.longdescription: Nonparametric Independence Tests Based on Entropy Estimation // Implementations of the weighted Kozachenko-Leonenko entropy estimator and independence tests based on this estimator, (Kozachenko and Leonenko (1987) http://mi.mathnet.ru/eng/ppi797). Also includes a goodness-of- fit test for a linear model which is an independence test between covariates and errors.
